title: Lunar Revel Gauntlets etc.
body:
I bought 5x Lunar envelopes during Lunar Revel, I have 2x Gauntlet relic that I now can't do anything with because I ran out of time to buy some more Envelopes... Will they just disappear? 
I was kind of hoping to be able to buy something to make up the 3 for the re-roll into chest and key.
